display_long_description:
🎃💀 ZOMBALL: Halloween Havoc! 💀🎃

Grab your ball, gear up, and step into the spookiest showdown of the season — where your throw is your only lifeline!

🧟‍♂️ They’re back from the dead — freakish sprinters, pumpkin-headed brutes, and hulking mega-zombies that only get meaner as the moon rises.
💪 The only way to survive? Throw like a pro, aim like a sniper, and dodge like your soul depends on it.
🎯 Every toss counts. Every miss costs.

It’s Dodgeball meets the Zombie Apocalypse, and Halloween has never been this intense.

This isn’t just a game — it’s a test of your reflexes, your focus, and your nerve.
Can you out-throw the undead and make it through the night?

Each wave grows darker, faster, and more chaotic — but so do you.
You’ll get sharper, stronger, and sneakier as you adapt to the swarm.

🔥 Train solo now — before the horde grows out of control.
🌪️ And when multiplayer drops… you’ll want to be the one everyone’s counting on.

🎃 ZOMBALL: Halloween Havoc
One ball. One arm. A billion zombies.
The Undead Don’t Miss — and neither can you.
